means: 蹒跚而行，拖着脚走，踉跄地走

list.abs: the meeting ended in a complete shambles ., 会议结束时混乱不堪.
My body ' s in shambles encrusted with brambles that sharpen the air I breathe ., 我的身体在废墟镶嵌与荆棘的锐化我呼吸的空气.
the crafty sons of darkness shall squirm in discomfort as their ritual of lies fall in shambles in pile around their deadened feet .狡猾的黑暗小人s应该会很不舒服地蠕动，因为他们谎言大厦将倒塌成废墟在他们的瘫腿附近堆满瓦砾。
多音字烂摊子的汉英词典搜索结果，点击看详细... ... 烂摊子(烂摊子)[ làntānzi] 烂摊子 a shambles.
It was a shambles that the fire left the building ., 这场火灾使这座建筑物留下的是一片废墟.
he was hollow-chested , squint-eyed , and rather shambling , but spry enough withal .他胸膛低陷，眼睛斜视，步履蹒跚，但又着实生气勃勃。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: probably from dialect shamble 'ungainly', perhaps from the phrase shamble legs, with reference to the legs of trestle tables (such as would be used in a meat market: see shambles)

entry.def: If you shamble somewhere, you walk clumsily, pulling your feet along the ground.

example.ex: The conductor shambled to the next carriage.
example.tran: 售票员慵懒地拖着脚走向下一节车厢。
他那高大而且步履蹒跚的背影

means.word_mean: 1. walking with a slow dragging motion without lifting your feet;

sentences.sentence: "from his shambling I assumed he was very old"
"We heard his feet shuffling down the hall"

auth_sentence.content: Goldwasser...watched Nobbs shamble back to his office.
auth_sentence.res_content: Goldwasser...watched Nobbs shamble back to his office.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Goldwasser...watched Nobbs shamble back to his office.

means.word_mean: 蹒跚而行, 拖着脚走, 踉跄地走

sentences.en: The old tramp shambled wearily up the path.
sentences.cn: 这个年老的流浪汉疲惫不堪, 蹒跚地走上了小路。
